details.title: Overview
details.text: Lofty, industrial-chic Belgian bakery with an open kitchen for tarts, plus coffee, tea & juice.

details.title: Spiritual Needs
details.text: Eat a tart here too. Deliciousness.

details.title: Overview
details.text: Cozy, informal eatery serving French bistro classics ranging from burgers & crêpes to mussels.

details.title: Spiritual Needs
details.text: We should pray for all the French people who come here. Order some mussels. Order a burger. Pay the bill.

details.title: Overview
details.text: Local spot for homemade morning/lunch fare like signature brown-sugar-glazed 'millionaire’s bacon.'

details.title: Spiritual Needs
details.text: We should pray for all the people who come here to eat brunch. Put your name on the list. Order an eggs benedict. Instagram your brunch.

details.title: Overview
details.text: Quirky flavors & handmade waffle cones draw crowds to this artisanal ice cream maker.

details.title: Spiritual Needs
details.text: This ice cream will change people's lives. Make sure to taste the monthly flavors, as well as the local ones. Stand in line. Taste all of the ice cream. Order your favorite flavor. Tip the ice cream scooper. Eat your ice cream before it melts. Tell all your friends about this place.

details.title: Overview
details.text: Bakery serving a mix of tarts, donuts & croissant-muffins, plus coffee in a cozy, bright space.

details.title: Spiritual Needs
details.text: Pray the cruffins haven't run out. Get there early. Order your cruffin and take a picture of it with the sign, then post on social media.

locations.name: Trestle
locations.summary: New American restaurant offering 3-course fixed-price meals in a quaint space with modern flair.
locations.spiritualSignificance: Pray people have enough money to give to the kingdom after eating here.

details.title: Overview
details.text: New American restaurant offering 3-course fixed-price meals in a quaint space with modern flair.

details.title: Spiritual Needs
details.text: Pray people have enough money to give to the kingdom after eating here. Make a reservation. Sit down and eat.
